languages.text: "Алтарь-Темплум-Каликсис-Экс-17. Я имел честь служить в данном святилище на протяжении нескольких тысяч циклов. Рекомендую воздержаться от его посещения — большинство техносоратников, населяющих станцию, погружены в медитативные вычисления, прерывать которые нежелательно".

"Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. I had the honour of tending to this shrine for a few thousand cycles. I suggest you abstain from visiting it as most tech-comrades at the station are engaged in meditative calculations that should not be interrupted."
languages.original_text: "Алтарь-Темплум-Каликсис-Экс-17. Я имел честь служить в данном святилище на протяжении нескольких тысяч циклов. Рекомендую воздержаться от его посещения — большинство техносоратников, населяющих станцию, погружены в медитативные вычисления, прерывать которые нежелательно".

traits.locale_text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. I had the honour of tending to this shrine for a few thousand cycles. I suggest you abstain from visiting it as most tech-brothers at the station are engaged in meditative calculations that should not be interrupted."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. I had the honour of tending to this shrine for a few thousand cycles. I suggest you abstain from visiting it as most tech-brothers at the station are engaged in meditative calculations that should not be interrupted."

traits.locale_text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. I had the honour of tending to this shrine for a few thousand cycles. I suggest you abstain from visiting it as most tech-brothers at the station are engaged in meditative calculations that should not be interrupted."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. I had the honour of tending to this shrine for a few thousand cycles. I suggest you abstain from visiting it as most tech-comrades at the station are engaged in meditative calculations that should not be interrupted."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Tuve el honor de cuidar de este santuario durante unos miles de ciclo. Sugiero que se abstenga de visitarlo; la mayoría de tecnocamaradas de la estación están sumidos en cálculos meditativos que no deben interrumpirse».
languages.original_text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. I had the honour of tending to this shrine for a few thousand cycles. I suggest you abstain from visiting it as most tech-comrades at the station are engaged in meditative calculations that should not be interrupted."

traits.locale_text: «Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Tuve el honor de cuidar de este santuario durante unos miles de ciclo. Sugiero que se abstenga de visitarlo; la mayoría de tecnocamaradas de la estación están sumidos en cálculos meditativos que no deben interrumpirse».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “卡利西斯祭坛17号，我曾有幸在那个神龛中服侍过几千个周期。我建议不要参观那里，因为我绝大部分的技术神甫同袍都在进行冥想计算，我们不应该干扰他们工作。”
languages.original_text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. I had the honour of tending to this shrine for a few thousand cycles. I suggest you abstain from visiting it as most tech-comrades at the station are engaged in meditative calculations that should not be interrupted."

traits.locale_text: “卡利西斯祭坛17号，我曾有幸在那个神龛中服侍过几千个周期。我建议不要参观那里，因为我绝大部分的科技祭司同袍都在进行冥想计算，我们不应该干扰他们工作。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「アルター・テンプラム・カリクシス-Ext-17。私は数千サイクルの間、この祠を管理する名誉を受けた。ステーションのほとんどの技術同胞は哲学的な計算に従事していて、これは中断されるべきではない。訪問を控えることをお勧めする」
languages.original_text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. I had the honour of tending to this shrine for a few thousand cycles. I suggest you abstain from visiting it as most tech-comrades at the station are engaged in meditative calculations that should not be interrupted."

traits.locale_text: 「アルター・テンプラム・カリクシス-Ext-17。私は数千サイクルの間、この祠を管理する名誉を受けた。ステーションのほとんどの技術同胞は哲学的な計算に従事していて、これは中断されるべきではない。訪問を控えることをお勧めする」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Ich hatte die Ehre, mich einige Tausend Zyklen um diesen Schrein zu kümmern. Ihr solltet Euch fernhalten, denn die meisten Tech-Kameraden auf der Station sind mit meditativen Berechnungen beschäftigt, die nicht unterbrochen werden sollten."
languages.original_text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. I had the honour of tending to this shrine for a few thousand cycles. I suggest you abstain from visiting it as most tech-comrades at the station are engaged in meditative calculations that should not be interrupted."

traits.locale_text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Ich hatte die Ehre, mich einige Tausend Zyklen um diesen Schrein zu kümmern. Ihr solltet Euch fernhalten, denn die meisten Tech-Kameraden auf der Station sind mit meditativen Berechnungen beschäftigt, die nicht unterbrochen werden sollten."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. J'ai eu l'honneur de m'occuper de ce temple pendant quelques milliers de cycles. Je vous déconseille de vous y rendre, car la plupart de mes technoconfrères dans la station s'adonnent à des calculs méditatifs qu'il ne faut pas interrompre. »
languages.original_text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. I had the honour of tending to this shrine for a few thousand cycles. I suggest you abstain from visiting it as most tech-comrades at the station are engaged in meditative calculations that should not be interrupted."

traits.locale_text: « Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. J'ai eu l'honneur de m'occuper de ce temple pendant quelques milliers de cycles. Je vous déconseille de vous y rendre, car la plupart de mes technoconfrères dans la station s'adonnent à des calculs méditatifs qu'il ne faut pas interrompre. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Birkaç bin döngü boyunca o mabetle ilgilenme şerefine nail olmuştum. İstasyondaki çoğu tekno yoldaşım, meditasyon gerektiren hesaplamalarla meşgul olup rahatsız edilmemelidir. Dolayısıyla ziyaretten kaçınmanızı tavsiye ederim."
languages.original_text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. I had the honour of tending to this shrine for a few thousand cycles. I suggest you abstain from visiting it as most tech-comrades at the station are engaged in meditative calculations that should not be interrupted."

traits.locale_text: "Altar-Templum-Calixis-Ext-17. Birkaç bin döngü boyunca o mabetle ilgilenme onuruna nail olmuştum. İstasyondaki çoğu tekno yoldaşım meditasyon gerektiren hesaplamalarla meşgullerdir ve rahatsız edilmemelidirler, dolayısıyla ziyaret etmekten kaçınmanızı tavsiye ederim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
